post_message: A comprehensive study from the National Academies of Sciences, Engineering and Medicine shows that immigrants coming into the U.S. have helped the economy in the long haul and had little lasting impact on the employment levels of native-born Americans. The conclusion runs counter to a popular narrative suggesting that immigrants take the jobs of U.S. citizens.
